p: Relative to the null model where r = 0 km (null pixel model), established partnerships from r = 81 to 729 km favor climate change adaptation by increasing all indicators ( Fig 3Aâ€“3D), except climate-area velocity ( Fig 3E and 3F). Climate-area velocity decreases because partnerships increase spatial variability in either annual mean temperature ( Table 1) or annual precipitation and thus decrease the future area needed to preserve the current climate space.
